product_name: The North Face Light Zip-Neck Top - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For cool to cold weather activities, the Light Zip-Neck Top from The North Face provides optimal warmth and moisture management when you're running, hiking and cross-country skiing. Made from comfortable, moisture-wicking polyester knit fabric with FlashDry(TM) technology to improve dry time and breathability. Fabric has a touch of stretch for great mobility. Flatlock seams offer flexibility and comfort. Closeout.
short_description: For cool to cold weather activities, the Light Zip-Neck Top from The North Face provides optimal warmth and moisture management when you're running, hiking and cross-country skiing.
